plugins.name: actionbook
plugins.description: Up-to-date action manuals for browser automation. Get verified CSS/XPath selectors for any website directly into your agent context.

plugins.name: rust-learner
plugins.description: Learn Rust language features and crate updates using Actionbook + agent-browser.

plugins.name: arxiv-viewer
plugins.description: View, search, download, and read academic papers from arXiv. Supports API queries, web scraping via Actionbook, and HTML paper reading via ar5iv.

plugins.name: actionbook-scraper
plugins.description: Generate accurate web scraper code using Actionbook's verified selectors. Achieves 7.76x better data extraction accuracy compared to AI-guessed selectors.
